channel.title: Im Soooo Confused Portforward

item.title: Im Soooo Confused Portforward
item.dc:creator: @XD_you_k0_XD XD you k0 XD
item.description:
@XD_you_k0_XD wrote:

okey go to start search for cmd
put in cmd ipconfig press enter scroll up u see ur ip copy it go to internet paste it press enter now ur at ur router put in the name and password u can also find them on ur router real life then go to advenced setting/forwarding or portforwarding now u will see a screen with:
Put at the first port 43594 like here btw if u can choose TCP/UDP/BOTH choose BOTH otherwise just TCP.

PORT PORT
43594 43594

Press aply and wait some seconds now u opened ur port
go to no-ip.com
regist there add a host like epicscape.no-ip.org
then download it and search for it at start now just open it and close it.
then go to www.portforward.com download the PFchecker
when it´s downloaded open it press in ur port and press in TCP Then hes looking if ur port is open and if he can ping ur router.

He must say that it’s all good exept if u got a old or weird router it will say “I can not Ping Your Router” What means ur port is open but u can’t host ur server urself get a VPS then 40$ a month 24/7 i tought

Hope u will figure it out and hope u can portforward the most routers can.
Greetz.

Read full topic

SOOO ANYONE GONNA HELP ME??
